thread.section_title: Ingram's Water & Air Equipment Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Ingram's Water & Air Equipment | ingramswaterandair.com | 2 of 96
thread.title: Vladimir A.
thread.title_full: Ingram's Water & Air Equipment reviewed by Vladimir A.

author: Vladimir A.
title: Vladimir A.
text:
I purchased the 5 ton full Goodman system from Ingram's. The buying process went very smooth. I received equipment on time with no problems.
I inspected the shipment on arrival and discovered a small dent in the unit, but it was cosmetic and no issues. If you want to get equipment you really want and not what just provided by the installer this is the way to go. All the specifications for the equipment are available on the website and easy to access. My installer already got everything up and running with no problem.
